tier.item: a. * Nyaan-níi xan namiccá xa nyáacc-úu jir-ú beexan baréedaa.
food-Nom as man as eat-VN exist-Dep know.Pl nice
`The food that they know the man who is eating is nice.'

b. * Gurbáa-n xani-f intalá arke gáarii.
`The boy who he saw and the girl is nice.'
b. * Gurbáa-n xani-f intalá arke gáarii.
`The boy who he saw and the girl is nice.'
The boy who he saw and the girl is nice.
a. Sun magalaa éen yúu itt déeme?
`That is the market who went to?'
a. Sun magalaa éen yúu itt déeme?
`That is the market who went to?'
Sun magalaa éen yúu itt déeme?
That is the market who went to?
`You know the field and which place?'
`You know the field and which place?'
You know the field and which place?
The harvest is good this year.
